channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Thousands flee as wildfires burn out of control in and around Los Angeles and homes are destroyed
item.description: California firefighters are battling wind-whipped wildfires tearing across the Los Angeles area. The blazes have destroyed homes, clogged roadways as tens of thousands fled and strained resources.

item.title: See photos of fire, smoke and flight as wildfires race across Southern California
Wildfire burns through LA enclave known for its beaches and celebrity allure
